vocabInfos.mediumDef:
1) to prevail, overcome, endure, have power, be able
1a) (Qal)
1a1) to be able, be able to gain or accomplish, be able to endure, be able to reach
1a2) to prevail, prevail over or against, overcome, be victor
1a3) to have ability, have strength
Aramaic equivalent: ye.khel (יְכִל "be able" H3202)
vocabInfos._es_Definition: qal   ser capaz, tolerar, perseverar, prevalecer
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 有權力, 有能力
1a) (Qal)
1a1) 有能力, 有能力去獲取或完成, 有能力去忍受,
1a2) 勝過, 克服
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 有权力, 有能力
1a) (Qal)
1a1) 有能力, 有能力去获取或完成, 有能力去忍受,
1a2) 胜过, 克服
